meanings.definition: Relating to or involving different professions or professional disciplines working together.
meanings.sent1: The interprofessional team of doctors and nurses provided excellent care to the patient.
meanings.sent2: The hospital has an interprofessional approach, with doctors and pharmacists working closely together.
meanings.sent3: The interprofessional meeting between the engineers and architects was surprisingly productive.
meanings.sent4: The interprofessional collaboration between the chefs and nutritionists resulted in a delicious and healthy menu.
meanings.sent5: The interprofessional project showcased the benefits of teamwork and shared expertise.

meanings.definition: Involving collaboration between professionals from different fields.
meanings.sent1: The interprofessional conference brought together experts from various industries.
meanings.sent2: An interprofessional workshop allowed teachers and psychologists to exchange ideas.
meanings.sent3: The interprofessional event turned into a friendly competition between the lawyers and accountants.
meanings.sent4: The interprofessional partnership between the artists and programmers led to a unique and innovative product.
meanings.sent5: The interprofessional training emphasized the importance of communication and mutual respect.
